title: Champion of Hephaestus
name: Scavacoal - Champion of Hephaestus
printed_effect: This Scavacoal in your hand can Special Ascend from your {fire} Elestral if you have at least 2 Enchanted Artifact Runes on your field. Artifacts that were Empowering that Elestral start Empowering this Scavacoal instead of being sent to the Underworld.
effect: This Scavacoal in your hand can Special Ascend from your {fire} Elestral if you have at least 2 Enchanted Artifacts on your field. Artifacts that were Empowering that Elestral start Empowering this Scavacoal instead  of being sent to the Underworld.
